name: Moovair
0:
”Alexa, turn on living room.”
”Alexa, turn off living room.”
”Alexa, set living room temperature to seventy two degrees.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Using this skill, you can control Moovair air conditioner: turn on/off, change operating mode, set temperature and use other functions.
After the user wakes up the speaker by “Alexa, turn on air conditioner.” to call this skill, you can easily control the air conditioner. Users must do Account Linking following the steps below:
1. Click the ENABLE button, then enter the registered Moovair APP account.
2. If you do not have a Moovair APP account, download "Moovair" app from Google Play or App Store;
3. After installation and registration, complete the air conditioner activation configuration.
4. Back to the Account Linking interface of Alexa APP, enter the registered Moovair App account to complete Account Linking.
